archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.3.5f: f) providing a method of securely destroying or returning the organisation's information software or equipment as soon as it is no longer required (e.g. according to the organisation's document retention policy, or equivalent), with documented evidence this process has taken place.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
